description:
‘’Kid’s Art Coloring Book» – It’s a coloring book game for kids with lots of beautiful drawings and tools that would help express feelings and develop creativity.
You can color pictures or draw your own masterpieces! Share your work with your family, friends and the whole world!

FEATURES
- 4 different categories: Sea, Animals, Space, Yummy
- 50 canvases
- 8 advanced tools that paint inside contours
- A palette of 96 colors
- Whiteboard for creating own masterpieces
- Save your paintings to album
- Pleasant background music
name: Kid's Art Coloring Book
